EmailTemplate.description: Notification to user that promotion Ends today
EmailTemplate.name: Promotion End Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Workflow updated for Promotion {!ACCL__Promotion__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team, This is to notify that the Promotion {!ACCL__Promotion__c.Name} is about to end today. Kindly take an action if required
Thanks.
